txt.en: By swiveling this mirror back into place, you will help to restore the old lighting system to the dark and dangerous halls of Moria. It is a small victory for the dwarves' expedition, but a victory nonetheless.

'Ah, [placeholder]! I wondered who brought the light back to this hall. Your efforts to restore the lighting system are a great endeavour, you know. It may seem a minor task, but I think this is a great deed!'
The mirrors of Moria often get knocked out of alignment by the unwelcome inhabitants of the deeps.
Speak with Simbi at the Twenty-first Hall
Simbi is in the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should tell Simbi of your restoration of the lighting system in Zelem-melek.
